verbose_text: In experiments originally designed to investigate the effect of premature Notch1 activation on the development of neural crest derived olfactory ensheathing glial cells (OECs), we used in ovo electroporation to insert a tetracycline inducible NotchDeltaE construct (encoding a constitutively active mutant of mouse Notch1) into the genome of chicken cranial neural crest cell precursors, and activated NotchDeltaE expression by doxycycline injection at embryonic day 4.
